cooked: we are having a western themed wedding and i have no clue as to what i am doing. I am planning this pretty much by myself with little help. out colors are blue, white and yellow. it will be at the end of march and its coming up quick. i have no clue as to what happens during the ceremony nor reception. never been to a wedding. i have my invitations printed and ready to go have my flowers picked out have our venue reserved and paid for. we are still trying to find an officiant, which i figure will help out with what all happens when during the ceremony. please help
